extendedInfo.description: JenausCam is the service in which you can see the webcam on the Android devices (smart phones, smart pads).Just install a simple program for webcam to your PC and install App, then you can enjoy watching webcam without the limitation of network  such as 3G, WIFI.(JenausCam may not work behind some kind of firewall.)When you want see the pets playing at home from outside, when you go out leaving kids alone at home, when you want to check  the  state of house from your long term trip, confirm those using your JenausCam.Specific characteristics* Use smartphone to watch webcam video in real-time.* You can watch the webcam video from multiple phones at the same time.* You can save the current state using the snapshot feature.* Recording function can do the recording on the PC, and it can be remote controlled.* You can zoom in/out the images of the smart phone.Refer to How to Use the service (http://www.jenauscam.com/ guide.)* Visit site http :/ / www.jenauscam.com/,  and create an account.* You can download PC programs and install the program from site  http://www.jenauscam.com/ * After you run the installed PC program, log in with a generated account at the site.* Install the smart phone app.* After running the app, log in with an account  generated at the site.* You can watch the video of the webcam.Keywords : security webcam, remote recording, webcam program, pet monitor, spy camera, spy webcam, surveillance webcamFor more details visit http://www.jenauscam.com/

reviews.title: wonderfully fantastic
reviews.comment: Truely A 5 minute setup tryed several others before happening upon yours and you take the cake fo sho...thank you for your work and it actually works as opposed to the several other junk ones in google play...Food for thought maybe some zoom options and like the other person said sound could be handy,,maybe some way we could remotely adjust lighting I know im asking alot but im so happy it works as well as it does and sooooo simple to setup keep up the good work and im a follower of yours now!!!!!congrads ( Samsung Galaxy S3) that remote record is another fabulous perk as well. the longer i let it run the faster and sharper it\'s becoming could just be me but very clear imaging..
reviews.author: Nicholas Miller

reviews.title: Reliable. Lil more work needed.
reviews.comment: Cam runs well, no lag. Decent framerate. Easy 1 touch on off record on pc and cell, I like the remote record feature.  On pc needs more settings, controls, window size and multicam options. App stays locked in order to view feed, but no lag. Good potential, Fix these then 5...
reviews.author: Ei Cri
